publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 06/08/16, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To 210 lb. Beef $4.75 pr unit. dld.
To Cash $9.00 to go to Taunton
By work at Doct. Morey Place
To Tax on House + farm for 1843
To 8ft - 2inch eight ft & 6 inch & 8 ft 2in of
hard wood, amounting in the whole
to 24 ft. 10 inch at $3-75 pr cord
To cash fr Bonnet, Box + Cravat
To cash to cary to Taunton 60/
